greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Rectangular array T(n,k) = f(n)*k^2, where f = A005117 (squarefree numbers); n, k >= 1; read by antidiagonals.
comment: Every positive integer occurs exactly once.
mathematica: Table[u[k, n - k + 1], {n, 1, 15}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* A249327 sequence *)
xref: Cf. A005117, A000037 (is partitioned by the rows of A249327, excluding the first).
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Oct 26 2014
